channel.title: Declaration of Perpetual Unity on Superphysics
channel.description: Recent content in Declaration of Perpetual Unity on Superphysics

item.title: Articles
item.description: Article: Minimum Requirements Everyone has the right to: a standard of living adequate for the health and well-being of himself and his family, including: food clothing housing medical care necessary social services the right to security in the event of unemployment, sickness, disability, widowhood, old age or other lack of livelihood in circumstances beyond his control. Motherhood and childhood are entitled to special care and assistance.
